name: Flexing
description: 3 points for every second spent while buff

name: Aggressive Specialization
description: Eliminations get 1.5x points. No points for delivering Gacha Balls and Wart riding.

name: Taking a Dive
description: 150 points when on the losing team

name: Collective Specialization
description: Delivering Gacha Balls gets 1.4x points. No points for Eliminations and Wart riding.

name: Litter Collection
description: 50 points for picking up a loose Gacha Ball

name: Touching the Wart
description: If Wart is closer to your team's trap than the opponent's, +100 points

name: Victory Lap
description: 100 points when on the winning team

name: Baiting the Trap
description: 150 points when team wins by riding Wart into the trap

name: Moki Smash
description: 150 points when team wins by Eliminations

name: Grabbing Balls
description: 150 points when team wins by Gacha Ball deliveries

name: Cursed Dinner
description: 50 points every time you eat a Moki while riding Wart

name: Wart Rodeo
description: 3 points for every second spent riding wart

name: Gacha Hoarding
description: Double total points with 6+ base Gacha deliveries. 0 total points with fewer than 6.

name: Saccing
description: 75 points for being eaten by Wart

name: Collect 'Em All
description: 35 points per EACH unique card rarity in lineup

name: Beat the Buzzer
description: 200 points when winning Gacha Ball delivered to base

name: Final Blow
description: 200 points when achieving winning elimination

name: Enforcing the Naughty List
description: Double total points with 5+ eliminations. 0 total points with fewer than 5.

name: Big Game Hunt
description: 200 points for riding Wart into the trap

name: Costume Party
description: 25 points for EACH Onesie or Lemon, Kappa, Tomato, Bear, Frog, or Blob Head in lineup

name: Shapeshifting
description: 25 points for EACH Tongue Out trait or Tanuki, Kitsune, or Cat Mask trait in lineup

name: Midnight Strike
description: 25 on points for EACH Shadow Fur trait in lineup

name: Dress to Impress
description: 25 points for EACH of any Kimono trait in lineup

name: Housekeeping
description: 25 points for EACH Apron, Garbage/Gold Can, or Toilet Paper trait in lineup

name: Dungaree Duel
description: 25 points for EACH Pink, Blue, or Green Overalls trait in lineup

name: Tear Jerking
description: 25 points for EACH Crying Eye trait in lineup

name: Golden Shower
description: 25 points for EACH Gold Fur trait in lineup

name: Rainbow Riot
description: 25 points for EACH Rainbow Fur trait in lineup

name: Divine Intervention
description: 25 points for EACH Spirit Fur trait in lineup

name: Whale Watching
description: 25 points for EACH 1 of 1 Moki in lineup

name: Call to Arms
description: 25 points for EACH Ronin or Samurai trait in lineup

name: Malicious Intent
description: 25 points for EACH Devious Mouth trait or Oni, Tengu, or Skull Mask trait in lineup

name: Running Interference
description: 50 points for being eliminated

name: Gacha Gouging
description: 15 points per Gacha Ball delivered, and +20 per Elimination

name: Cage Match
description: 35 points Per Moki Elimination, +10 points per Gacha Ball delivered
